title: Trello and MYOB Tools
splash: A collection of Trello and MYOB tools for communicating with the API.
description: Main collection of work from my time at K-Drive. Collection of various functions that tie to MYOB and Trello APIs linked together by various scripts to help automate various aspects of the company.

title: ICRAR
splash: A dashboard to show data and logs from a buoy from the coast of Western Australia
description: This is a dashboard developed under the direct specifications of an ICRAR staff. It is used to display incoming logging and weather data from a remote resource in northern Western Australia.

title: OMEGELUL
splash: A chatroom application that matches people up and gives them a topic to talk about.
description: As part of a course on Agile Web Development. This is a simple chat application that pairs two random users together with a given randomly selected topic for them to discuss. Inspired by a removed feature from OMEGLE. Developed using the Flask micro-framework.

title: Quiz Website
splash: A quiz website built using base Java. A proof of concept to demonstrate internet protocol communication between servers.
description: Part of a unit on computer networking and communication.  This project involved linking a front-end facing quiz service to a separate and disparate backend database, with only TCP/IP packets to communicate with. My main responsibility was developing the front-end facing part of the website, which is a simple web-server that servers HTML over HTTP to a web browser. Written in Java.

title: Minecraft Alpha Chunk Culler
splash: A simple tool to delete chunks past the 36x36 area of spawn in the original alpha Minecraft file format.
description: In the absence of a version of MCEdit that could read Minecraft Alpha files, I designed this application to delete chunks past a 36x36 chunk radius around the center spawn chunks. Useful for people who want to do a "through the years" playthrough where they progress through versions of the game. Programmed in Java.
